original_text: And the first of all the firstfruits of all things, and every oblation of all, of every sort of your oblations, shall be the priest's: ye shall also give unto the priest the first of your dough, that he may cause the blessing to rest in thine house.
korean_text: 또 각종 처음 익은 열매와 너희 모든 예물 중에 각종 거제 제물을 다 제사장에게 돌리고 너희가 또 첫 밀가루를 제사장에게 주어 그들에게 네 집에 복이 내리도록 하게 하라

sentences.original_text: And the first of all the firstfruits of all things
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 모든 것의 첫 열매 중 첫 번째 것은

sentences.original_text: of every sort of your oblations
ye shall also give unto the priest
that he may cause the blessing to rest
